newsArray.title: IPL 2023 से पहले स्‍टीव स्मिथ को मिला खरीदार! VIDEO संदेश जारी कर बताया टीम का नाम, नई भूमिका में आएंगे नजर
newsArray.description: स्‍टीव स्मिथ (Steve Smith) साल 2010 से आईपीएल से जुड़े हुए हैं. यह पहला मौका है जब किसी आईपीएल टीम ने स्मिथ पर दांव नहीं लगाया है. यही वजह है कि अब उन्‍होंने इंडियन प्रीमियर लीग के 16वें संस्‍करण से जुड़ने का नया तरीका अख्‍तियार कर लिया है. वीडियो जारी कर स्मिथ ने बताया कि उन्‍हें 'टीम इंडिया' को ज्‍वाइन कर लिया है.
newsArray.content: स्‍टीव स्मिथ बीते सीजन तक दिल्‍ली कैपिटल्‍स का हिस्‍सा थे. (Twitter/IPL) नई दिल्‍ली. आईपीएल (IPL 2023) से पहले हुए ऑक्‍शन के दौरान ऑस्‍ट्रेलिया की टीम के स्‍टार बल्‍लेबाज स्‍टीव स्मिथ को किसी भी फ्रेंचाइजी ने नहीं खरीदा. राजस्‍थान रॉयल्‍स की कप्‍तानी कर चुके स्मिथ ने हाल ही में रोहित शर्मा की कप्‍तानी वाली भारतीय टीम को वनडे सीरीज के दौरान 2-1 से मात दी है. भारत को चार साल बाद अपने घर पर द्विपक्षीय सीरीज में स्मिथ की टीम के हाथों की कारारी शिकस्‍त झेलनी पड़ी. ऐसे में आईपीएल में कांट्रेक्‍ट नहीं मिलने के बाद स्मिथ ने इस लीग से जुड़ने का नया रास्‍ता ढूंढ लिया है. स्मिथ ने वीडियो संदेश जारी कर आईपीएल से जुड़ने की जानकारी दी. हालां‍कि किस भूमिका में वो नजर आएंगे अभी इस बात का खुलासा नहीं किया गया है. 14 सेकेंड के वीडियो में स्मिथ ने बताया कि वो एक अलग तरह से आईपीएल से जुड़ गए हैं। माना जा रहा है कि इस सीजन कमेंटेटर के रूप में नजर आ सकते हैं. स्‍टीव स्मिथ ने स्‍वयं सोमवार को एक वीडियो संदेश जारी का इस बात का ऐलान किया. स्मिथ ने अपनी वीडियो की शुरुआत में नमस्‍ते इंडिया बोलकर संबोधित किया. इसके बाद उन्‍होंने कहा कि मेरे पास आपके लिए एक अच्‍छी खबर है. मैं आईपीएल 2023 से जुड़ गया हूं. हां आपने सही सुना. मैं एक अलग टीम इंडिया को ज्‍वाइन करने जा रहा हूं. pic.twitter.com/NoU1ZAtZzF — Steve Smith (@stevesmith49) March 27, 2023 स्‍टीव स्मिथ आईपीएल में कुल छह फ्रेंचाइजी के लिए खेल चुके हैं. साल 2010 में उन्‍होंने अपने आईपीएल करियर की शुरुआत की थी. तब वो रॉयल चैलेंजर्स बैंगलोर का हिस्‍सा बने थे. इसके बाद वो पुणे सुपर जायंट्स, पुणे वॉरियर्स, कोच्चि टस्‍कर, राजस्‍थान रॉयल्स और दिल्‍ली कैपिटल्‍स का हिस्‍सा बने. IPL 2023: शुरुआती मैच नहीं खेल पाएंगे 9 अफ्रीकी सुपरस्‍टार, एक टीम का कप्‍तान नदारद, धोनी को सबसे कम नुकसान IPL में सबसे ज्‍यादा मेडन डालने वाले 6 भारतीय, दूसरा नाम है दिलचस्‍प, लगा चुका है सबसे लंबा छक्‍का आईपीएल 2023 से पहले ऑक्‍शन के दौरान उन्‍हें किसी भी फ्रेंचाइजी ने नहीं खरीदा. हालांकि उन्‍होंने इसका करारा जवाब बिग बैश लीग के माध्‍यम से दिया. बीबीएल में स्‍टीव स्मिथ ने बैक टू बैक दो मैचों में तूफानी शतक जड़े और यह साबित किया कि खेल के सबसे छोटे प्रारूप में भी वो एक घातक बल्‍लेबाज हैं. ब्रेकिंग न्यूज़ हिंदी में सबसे पहले पढ़ें News18 हिंदी| आज की ताजा खबर, लाइव न्यूज अपडेट, पढ़ें सबसे विश्वसनीय हिंदी न्यूज़ वेबसाइट News18 हिंदी| Tags: Indian premier league , IPL 2023 , Steve Smith IPL 2023: शुरुआती मैच नहीं खेल पाएंगे 9 अफ्रीकी सुपरस्‍टार, एक टीम का कप्‍तान नदारद, धोनी को सबसे कम नुकसान पहले पति से नहीं बन पाई बात, तो दूसरी बार की शादी, इन 6 टीवी एक्ट्रेस ने प्यार को दिया दूसरा चांस 21 छक्के और 299 रन, टी20 टूर्नामेंट में उठाया था बवंडर, अब मिली KKR की कप्तानी

newsArray.title: Eee Saala Cup Namde? RCB bank on consistency to end elusive wait for IPL title
newsArray.description: Eee Saala Cup Namde? RCB bank on consistency to end elusive wait for IPL title
newsArray.content: : "Eee Saala Cup Namde (The cup is ours this year)," said AB de Villiers at a star-studded event in Bengaluru days ahead of the start of the IPL 2023 season. Another year has passed, in fact, 15 have, without RCB, one of the most popular and power-packed franchises over the years, laying their hands on the IPL trophy. RCB's title wait has extended so much so that 'Eee Saala Cup Namde', a popular phrase that was aimed at exuding optimism is being looked at as a curse-laden one. There were more 'oohs and aahs' than an added sense of excitement when de Villiers screamed the phrase at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium. Several experts have tried to decode RCB's inability to deliver on the big stage. For all the talent that they have possessed over the years, the lack of the killer instinct has become a recurring phenomenon. RCB have reached the final three times but are yet to go past the ultimate hurdle. Legendary West Indies batter Chris Gayle recently pointed fingers at the superstar culture in RCB for their lack of trophies, saying all the attention during his time was on 3 men -- , Virat Kohli, and himself. The three men were pillars of a fearsome RCB batting unit but lack of resources in other departments cost them during the trio's time together. The 2016 RCB team that lost to SunRisers Hyderabad in the final had Gayle, Kohli, de Villiers, Shane Watson and KL Rahul in their ranks but their bowling unit was the most fancied in the tournament. ðŸ’¥ Destructive batter ðŸ¥Š Powerful Striker ðŸ•º Ultimate Entertainer ðŸŒ Universal Boss Here's celebrating some of the best moments of RCB Hall of Famer ðŸŽ–ï¸ Chris Gayle! ðŸ’ª — Royal Challengers Bangalore (@RCBTweets) However, the arrival of Mike Hesson, first as the coach and then the Director of Cricket, has added stability and an added sense of direction to the team. RCB have made the playoffs of IPL for three successive seasons and they fell one step short of reaching the final in the 2022 season, under new captain Faf du Plessis. Unlike a few other teams, RCB have not made wholesale changes to their squad for IPL 2023. They have retained the core from the last season and bought only 7 players, more importantly, one two overseas players at the mini-auction. One of them, Will Jacks, an England all-rounder, has been ruled out and RCB went for New Zealand all-rounder Michael Bracewell, a proven talent in T20Is, as his replacement. Left-arm pacer Reece Topley adds to the bowling arsenal at RCB. However, injury woes to Australia pacer Josh Hazlewood, who flew back midway through the Border-Gavaskar Trophy is going to be a headache for the side. Rajat Patidar, who hit the fastest hundred by an Indian in the Eliminator in a breakthrough season in IPL 2022, is also unlikely to take part in the first half of the season due to a heel injury. While the likes of David Willey and Reece Topley can make up for Josh Hazlewood's absence, Patidar's unavailability is going to leave a big hole in the RCB middle order. The likes of Shahbaz Ahmed and Suyash Prabhudesai need to step up and deliver consistently in the middle-order, which also has Dinesh Karthik, who hasn't played a lot of competitive cricket, unlike last year. However, the return of from a long injury lay-off should boost their confidence ahead of the new season. More importantly, Virat Kohli seems to be in fine form and in a great frame of mind after having ended his lean patch and multiple century droughts. Since hitting his maiden T20I hundred against Afghanistan in the Asia Cup last year, Kohli has gone on to hit 3 ODI hundreds and a Test hundred. The Test hundred came after 15 innings without a fifty-plus score as he hit a 186 to help India clinch a draw in the fourth and final Test of the Border-Gavsakar Trophy in March. For someone who puts Test cricket on a pedestal, Virat Kohli spoke about the impact of the Test hundred on his game and frame of mind after the Ahmedabad masterclass. "So, when I made the hundred and converted it into a big one, that gave me a sense of calmness, relaxation, and excitement again," Kohli said during an interaction with AB de Villiers earlier in March. "You kind of become comfortable with your game, and your thinking, and your heart is not rising before the next practice session. You eventually want to be in such a space. And that particular hundred gave me a grounded feeling back," he added. Nothing just the first team practice at Chinnaswamy and two of the legends of bengaluru back in front of our amazing fans â¤ï¸ — Virat Kohli (@imVkohli) Going by numbers, Virat Kohli has rarely had a poor IPL season. Even when he was struggling to get big scores in international cricket last year, Kohli scored 341 runs in 16 matches. However, Kohli's strike rate, which has hovered around 110 in the last two seasons, is a cause for concern. The former captain was not picked for the T20I series against Sri Lanka and New Zealand earlier this year along with Rohit Sharma. While the team management and the selectors hinted that they are looking towards the future, both Kohli and Rohit retained their places in the A-plus category in the BCCI Annual Retainership contract for 2022-23 which was made public on Sunday, March 26. Kohli will be keen on proving naysayers wrong and proving his mettle at the top of the order for RCB. A brisker approach from the in-form batter will be key as Faf du Plessis, the skipper, tends to take his time before finding his gear. Despite not playing international cricket in the recent past, Faf du Plessis has shown no signs of slowing down. In his first season with RCB last year, the South Africa star hit 468 runs. In the recently-concluded SA20, the 38-year-old scored 369 runs, including a century, at a strike rate of close to 150 for the Joburg Super Kings. On the other hand, RCB will hope Wanindu Hasaranga, their lead spinner, finds as much success as Yuzvendra Chahal found at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium, which has been a high-scoring venue because of its small boundaries. Chahal picked up 51 wickets in the IPL at the venue at an impressive economy rate of 7.74. No other bowler has managed to even pick 30 wickets in Bengaluru in the history of IPL. Harshal Patel's waning form at the international level saw him slip out of the reckoning of Team India but the highly-rated pacer will be keen on proving his naysayers wrong. A determined Harshal will be an added advantage for RCB at their home ground, where his variations might come into play. RCB are playing 6 of their 7 home games in April due to the state elections in Karnataka in May. The former finalists will want to make the most of the early home advantage.
